definition: pending a decision/hanging in the balance
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: Because commercial pattern is pendent , all jobs backwater not before.
sentences.chinese: 由于商业模式悬而未决，所有的工作都停滞不前。
一个漫长的诉讼仍悬而未决。

sentences.english: The pending debate should be placed before a larger audience.
sentences.chinese: 那个悬而未决的问题应让更多的人来讨论。

sentences.english: There is some conflict in the air.
Indeed, another request from Taipei is still pending.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，台北的另一项请求仍悬而未决。

sentences.english: The position of goalkeeper is moot.
sentences.chinese: 阿森纳门将位置至今悬而未决。

sentences.english: Clinton ended up carrying Illinois, then a tossup state.
sentences.chinese: 克林顿拿下了当时悬而未决的伊利诺伊州。

sentences.english: The desynchronization attack is very difficult to tackle and still an open question.
sentences.chinese: 去同步攻击很难对付，依然是一个悬而未决的课题。

sentences.english: Rigden asked. “That’s a really open question.
sentences.chinese: 里格登问道，“这确实是个悬而未决的问题。”

sentences.english: One unresolved issue is how to define a "skilled" immigrant.
sentences.chinese: 一个悬而未决的问题是如何定义“技术”移民。

sentences.english: The transition of Chinese real estate year, a series of pendent problems need to unscramble.
sentences.chinese: 中国地产的转型年，一系列悬而未决的问题需要解读。

sentences.english: Yet another longstanding mystery is why Mercury has a magnetic field.
sentences.chinese: 另一个悬而未决的谜团是为什么水星上有磁场。

sentences.english: Young said the results of Trueheart's blood tests were pending.
sentences.chinese: 杨说，特鲁哈特的血液测试的结果仍然悬而未决。

sentences.english: Several required ratifications are still outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 目前几项法定的批准程序仍然悬而未决。

sentences.english: What happens is that both the American and European dreams hang in the balance.
sentences.chinese: 美国梦和欧洲梦都正变得悬而未决。
这个案子一直悬而未决。

definition: riddle/enigma/unpredictable situation/elusive matters
"Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
impossible to unravel/confusing
unresolved question/unresolved case
unresolved/awaiting solution
doubts and suspicions/a maze of doubts/puzzle/mystery
going or staying
riddle
see 謎兒|谜儿[mei4 r5], riddle
to shelve/to set aside
Palestinian-Israeli (relations)
contention
puzzle/riddle
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
to withhold information/to keep sth secret
each sticks to his own version (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
variable (math.)
